mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_REPLY_NO, BOARD_REPLY_DT, BOARD_REPLY_MT, BOARD_REPLY_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICK, MEMBER_IMAGE FROM BOARD_REPLY JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_REPLY_ST = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY BOARD_REPLY_NO DESC

SELECT BOARD_REPLY_NO, BOARD_REPLY_DT, BOARD_REPLY_MT, BOARD_REPLY_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICK, MEMBER_IMAGE FROM BOARD_REPLY JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_REPLY_ST = 'R' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY BOARD_REPLY_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_REPLY VALUES (SEQ_BRNO.NEXTVAL, #{replyContent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{boardNo}, #{memberNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_REPLY SET BOARD_REPLY_CONTENT = #{replyContent}, BOARD_REPLY_MT = DEFAULT WHERE BOARD_REPLY_NO = #{replyNo}
UPDATE BOARD_REPLY SET BOARD_REPLY_ST = 'R' WHERE BOARD_REPLY_NO = #{replyNo} AND BOARD_REPLY_ST NOT IN('N', 'R')
